variants.Description in input context: c.248G>A (p.G83D) causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.
This variant alters the protein's stability.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 60% for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.248G>A.
The protein was found to be degraded at an accelerated rate for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.250A>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis, followed by post-hoc Tukeyâ€™s test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7, with a standard deviation less than 10%.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7 OR a standard deviation greater than 20%.
